text: __NOTOC__ Martin Gareis (6 October 1891 – 26 February 1976) was a German general during World War II who held commands at the divisional, corps and army levels. He was a recipient of the Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross of Nazi Germany. ==Awards and decorations== * Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross on 29 November 1943 as Generalleutnant and commander of 98. Infanterie- Division Fellgiebel 2000, p. 159. ==References== ===Citations=== ===Bibliography=== * Category:1891 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Generals of Infantry (Wehrmacht) Category:Knights of the House Order of Hohenzollern Category:Recipients of the Gold German Cross Category:Recipients of the Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross Category:Recipients of the clasp to the Iron Cross, 1st class
title: Martin Gareis
